Articles.Content: With the overhauled Processing Lab I have collected all the science on Minmus and brought it to a Lab on the surface. Due to the 500 data limit it will take a while to process all the experiments and I'd like to bring those which are already processed back to Kerbin. Is there perhaps a mod that would allow me to transfer individual experiments into the return pod instead of grabbing everything that is in the lab?
Not that J know of. Better to try bringing copies of every experiment. Here modding might help by making more parts able to hold them.
Can it move single specific experiments out of several others from a pod?

> 
> Can it move single specific experiments out of several others from a pod?

Wait, no, it can't. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
